page.title: 05WHERE PEOPLE WORK
page.content:
We sent a{questionaire}home about where people{work,}and this is what we found out. Many people work out of{Earith} although they live in the{village. 12 out of the{16}people interviewed worked{out of Earith}and{4 worked in {Earith. Most}people{travelled}over{20 {miles}but only 2 people{less}than{5 {miles.}The most popular{transport}was the{car}because the{public transport} is not very good.There is no{rail {service}and the{bus service}is{ {irregular.}Most people have been working less than{15 years}at their {present job}and only 1 person has worked for 15 years.Most people work under{50 hours}a week.There were only 7 people that worked 50 hours or more.
(By Jonathan and Neil, aged 11 years)
